short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create marks on your pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can create and manage marks on your pages with this extension. All you have to do is right-click on current page and select the Pagemark option. Then the extension will be create a mark for you on current page.
